column1: '''Akallabeth MUSH''' is a MUSH in [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/akallabeth.html Akallabeth MUSH] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 15 April 2011)</ref> It is set specifically in {{SA}} 3179.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="Review">[http://haven.theonering.net/reviews/games/akallabeth.html Review] (retrieved 15 April 2011)</ref> There are four races:<ref name="Review"/>

column2: An Elf]] under the kingship of [[Gil-galad]]
A Númenoréan]], both man and woman.
